#summary Image gallery dashlet for Alfresco Share in the style of the G+ gallery.
#labels alfresco,dashlet,Featured

= Introduction =

The Gallery Plus dashlet was developeed for the 2011 Alfresco dashlet challenge by Florian Maul. I features a thumbnail view and an popup dialog with an image preview.
